name: NETXP LINUX Critical Elements Access Failures
description: Monitors failed attempts to open critical directories such as /etc, /bin, /sbin, /usr/bin, /usr/sbin, /var, /home, and /srv. Useful for detecting unauthorized access attempts to sensitive parts of the filesystem.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "unauthedfileaccess" and 
any where event.module: "auditd"
